attribute.name: federalIncomeTaxPercent
attribute.label: Federal Tax Percent
attribute.description: The percentage of Federal tax that needs to be withheld from the payment, entered directly or searched from valid values for a given Income Class Code in the Federal Tax Percent lookup.

attribute.name: stateIncomeTaxPercent
attribute.label: State Tax Percent
attribute.description: The percentage of State tax that needs to be withheld from the payment, entered directly or searched from valid values for a given Income Class Code in the State Tax Percent lookup.

attributeReference.name: incomeClassCode
attributeReference.description: The description of the Income Class for the Nonresident Alien (NRA) Tax. Select one from the pulldown list.

attributeReference.name: postalCountryCode
attributeReference.description: The code that identifies the country of residence for the Nonresident Alien (NRA) Tax

attribute.name: incomeTaxTreatyExemptCode
attribute.label: Treaty Exempt
attribute.description: The code to specify that the Nonresident Alien (NRA) Tax is treaty exempt, expressed as "Yes" or "No"

attribute.name: foreignSourceIncomeCode
attribute.label: Foreign Source
attribute.description: Checkbox to indicate if the payment is defined as foreign source based on U.S. income sourcing rules. It also indicates that there is no tax withholding on the payment.

attribute.name: incomeTaxGrossUpCode
attribute.label: Gross Up
attribute.description: The code to specify that the Nonresident Alien (NRA) Tax is "grossed up" to the original Account, expressed as "Yes" or "No".

attributeReference.name: referenceFinancialDocumentNumber
attributeReference.label: Reference Doc
attributeReference.description: A free-form text field that identifies a reference document for the Nonresident Alien (NRA) Tax.
